topics.body:
EHAN and I sure have been taking our sweet time with our Amending Fences ramble/review...

_Probably because we're trying to make a fully edited ramble/review video for the first time._ We want this review to be pretty good, so we're taking our time working on it, rather than having it rushed out. Production's just been slow/delayed lately, due to real-life activities/laziness.

We may have the video finalized and uploaded by either later tonight or sometime tomorrow.
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000
